title: WHMCS v4.5.2 Repack [Nulled] [iND] [ua3]
description:
========================================================================
WHMCS - The Complete Client Management, Billing & Support Solution
========================================================================

 Release Version: 4.5.2
    Release Type: Stable Release
    Release Date: 17th June 2011

 PLEASE READ ALL THE ENCLOSED INSTRUCTIONS

        Forums: http://forums.whmcs.com/
       Support: http://support.whmcs.com/
 Documentation: http://docs.whmcs.com/
   Client Area: http://www.whmcs.com/members/

========================================================================
[ CONTENTS ]
========================================================================

1. Server Requirements
2. Release Notes
3. New Installation Instructions
4. Upgrade Instructions
5. Post Installation Recommended Steps
6. Ioncube Installation Instructions


========================================================================
[ SERVER REQUIREMENTS ]
========================================================================

1. PHP Version 5.x or later
2. MySQL Version 4.1.x or later
3. Curl Support (with SSL)
4. GD Image Library
5. Ioncube Loaders Support


========================================================================
[ RELEASE NOTES ]
========================================================================

Specific release notes for this version of WHMCS can be found at:
 <a href="
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Version_4.5_Release_Notes" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Version_4.5_Release_Notes</a>


========================================================================
[ NEW INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS ]
========================================================================

For instructions on performing a new installation of WHMCS, please see:
 <a href="
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Installing_WHMCS#Installing_WHMCS" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Installing_WHMCS#Installing_WHMCS</a>


========================================================================
[ UPGRADE INSTRUCTIONS ]
========================================================================

The recommended steps for upgrading from an earlier version of WHMCS
to this latest release and any required template changes can be found
at:
 <a href="
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Version_4.5_Release_Notes#Upgrade_Steps" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Version_4.5_Release_Notes#Upgrade_Steps</a>


========================================================================
[ POST INSTALLATION TASKS ]
========================================================================

After WHMCS is installed, you need to configure your new install to be
ready for use.  We have a recommended order for doing this here:
 <a href="
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Installing_WHMCS#Post_Installation_Suggested_Steps" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://wiki.whmcs.com/Installing_WHMCS#Post_Installation_Suggested_Steps</a>


========================================================================
[ IONCUBE INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS ]
========================================================================

If Ioncube is not installed on your server, we have a guide for how to
configure it @ http://wiki.whmcs.com/Installing_WHMCS#Installing_Ioncube


========================================================================
